events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is scratched and seems faulty. It does not work as expected, and I would like to get this resolved quickly.
Based on the customer’s description mentioning scratches and faulty performance, this case is categorized under Product Defect for appropriate handling.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M., who specializes in product defects and quality issues.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your product. I’m here to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched and defective areas, along with the order number to help us proceed with the resolution?
I have attached photos showing the scratches and the faulty parts of the product. My order number is 123456789. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the information. We can offer a full replacement at no extra charge or provide a refund if you prefer. Please let us know which option works best for you.
I would like a replacement, please. Thank you for providing quick options. Looking forward to receiving the new product soon.
We have processed your replacement order and it will be shipped shortly. You will receive a tracking number via email very soon.
Hello! Just checking in to confirm that you have received your replacement product and that everything is working well. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and is in perfect condition. Thanks for the prompt support and resolving this issue.
We are happy the replacement met your expectations. The case is now closed. Please don’t hesitate to contact us for any future needs.
We have sent you a brief satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback helps us improve our services.
